name: Dark and Stormy Cocktail
description: A classic Dark and Stormy cockatil. Lime juice cuts the sweetness of ginger beer and Gosling's Rum while heightening the ginger's sharp bite.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce fresh lime juice, from 1 to 2 limes

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add, in layers, the lime juice, then the ginger beer, then the Goslings. Serve with a straw.
